TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClaimsPrincipal extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal

summary.span: 支持多个基于声明的标识的 实现。

span.span: An implementation that supports multiple claims-based identities.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和基于声明的标识已完全集成到.NET Framework。Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework. 这意味着现在表示.NET Framework 中的主体的许多类派生自而不是只需实现接口。This means that many classes that represent a principal in the .NET Framework now derive from rather than simply implementing the interface. 除了实现接口，公开属性和方法，可用于使用的声明。In addition to implementing the interface, exposes properties and methods that are useful for working with claims. 公开的标识，其中每个集合。 exposes a collection of identities, each of which is a . 通常情况下，此集合，通过访问属性，将仅具有单个元素。In the common case, this collection, which is accessed through the property, will only have a single element. 引入最主体类从中派生的主体作为.NET 4.5 中不会强制您需在您处理使用标识的方式进行任何更改。The introduction of in .NET 4.5 as the principal from which most principal classes derive does not force you to change anything in the way in which you deal with identity. 但是它 does 打开更多可能性并提供更多的机会，以实现更精细的访问控制。It does, however open up more possibilities and offer more chances to exercise finer access control. 例如:For example: - 应用程序代码本身可以直接使用当前的主体中包含的声明来驱动附加身份验证、 授权和个性化设置任务。The application code itself can work directly with the claims contained in the current principal to drive extra authentication, authorization, and personalization tasks. - 您可以使用声明处理管道，甚至在执行到达您的代码之前可以处理的身份验证请求和授权策略前端资源。You can front your resources with a claims processing pipeline, which can deal with authentication requests and authorization policy even before execution reaches your code. 例如，可以使用自定义声明身份验证管理器，从派生类的实例配置的基于 web 的应用程序或服务类。For example, you can configure a web-based application or service with a custom claims authentication manager, an instance of a class that derives from the class. 当这样配置后，请求处理管道会调用方法并向其传递你声明身份验证管理器表示传入请求的上下文。When so configured, the request processing pipeline invokes the method on your claims authentication manager passing it a that represents the context of the incoming request. 声明身份验证管理器然后可以执行身份验证根据传入声明的值。Your claims authentication manager can then perform authentication based on the values of the incoming claims. 它还可以筛选、 转换或将声明添加到传入声明集。It can also filter, transform, or add claims to the incoming claim set. 例如，它可用来扩充传入声明集从本地数据源，如本地用户配置文件创建新的声明For example, it could be used to enrich the incoming claim set with new claims created from a local data source such as a local user profile - 您可以使用自定义声明授权管理器，从派生类的实例配置的基于 web 的应用程序类。You can configure a web-based application with a custom claims authorization manager, an instance of a class that derives from the class. 在请求处理管道时这样配置，包传入中，并调用声明授权管理器上的方法。When so configured, the request processing pipeline packages the incoming in an and invokes the method on your claims authorization manager. 声明授权管理器随后可强制执行基于传入声明的授权。Your claims authorization manager can then enforce authorization based on the incoming claims. - 可以通过使用自定义声明授权管理器配置应用程序并使用执行内联基于声明的代码访问检查类来执行命令性访问检查或执行声明性访问检查。Inline claims-based code access checks can be performed by configuring your application with a custom claims authorization manager and using either the class to perform imperative access checks or the to perform declarative access checks. 基于声明的代码访问检查是内联执行，处理管道之外，这样就可供所有应用程序，只要声明授权管理器配置。Claims-based code access checks are performed inline, outside of the processing pipeline, and so are available to all applications as long as a claims authorization manager is configured. 你可以获取与 RP 应用程序 （或正在执行某线程的主体） 中的请求关联的强制转换的主体的实例属性设置为。You can obtain a instance for the principal associated with a request in an RP application (or the principal under which a thread is executing) by casting the property to . 与关联的声明对象都是可通过其属性。The claims associated with an object are available through its property. 属性返回的所有包含的与主体关联的标识声明。The property returns all of the claims contained by the identities associated with the principal. 在最不常见的情况下，在其中包含多个实例，可以使用属性，或通过使用可以访问的主要标识属性。In the uncommon case in which the contains multiple instances, you can use the property or you can access the primary identity by using the property. 提供几种方法可能会通过该搜索这些声明，并完全支持语言集成查询 (LINQ)。 provides several methods through which these claims may be searched and fully supports Language Integrated Query (LINQ). 标识可以通过使用添加到主体或方法。Identities can be added to the principal by using the or methods. > [!NOTE] > 若要添加到标识，调用方必须具有完全信任。To add identities to the , a caller must have full trust. 默认情况下，WIF 设置优先级对象时选择要通过返回的主标识属性。By default, WIF prioritizes objects when selecting the primary identity to return through the property. 可以通过提供的委托，通过修改此行为属性执行所选内容。You can modify this behavior by supplying a delegate through the property to perform the selection. 属性提供了类似功能属性。The property provides similar functionality for the property. 在基于声明的模型中，通过按其基础的标识提供的声明确定某一主体是否属于指定角色。In the claim-based model, whether a principal is in a specified role is determined by the claims presented by its underlying identities. 方法实质上是检查以确定它是否拥有具有指定的角色值的声明的主体与关联的每个标识。The method essentially examines each identity associated with the principal to determine whether it possesses a claim with the specified role value. 声明的类型 (由其属性) 用于确定应检查哪些声明在角色期间检查指定获得通过一个身份标识其属性。The type of the claim (represented by its property) used to determine which claims should be examined during role checks is specified on an identity through its property. 因此，在角色检查期间检查的声明可以是不同的标识与主体关联的不同类型。Thus, the claims examined during role checks can be of a different type for different identities associated with the principal. ## Examples 下面的示例提取由 HTTP 请求中的用户提供的声明，并将其写入到 HTTP 响应。The following example extracts the claims presented by a user in an HTTP request and writes them to the HTTP response. 当前用户读取作为。The current user is read from the as a . 声明然后从中读取，然后写入响应。The claims are then read from it and then are written to the response. ``` ClaimsPrincipal principal = HttpContext.Current.User as ClaimsPrincipal; if (null != principal) { foreach (Claim claim in principal.Claims) { Response.Write("CLAIM TYPE: " + claim.Type + "; CLAIM VALUE: " + claim.Value + "
"); } } ```

summary.span: 获取包含所有声明的集合，这些声明来自于与此声明主体关联的所有声明标识符。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all of the claims from all of the claims identities associated with this claims principal.
The claims associated with this principal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明主体所拥有的集合是可以通过标识属性访问的对象。A claims principal has a collection of objects that is accessible through the Identities property. 每个集合中包含一个或多个声明。Each in the collection contains one or more claims. 属性返回的所有声明从所有在此集合中的声明标识。The property returns all of the claims from all of the claims identities in this collection. 属性可以由的自定义实现检查类进行身份验证决策或筛选、 转换或扩充传入声明集; 的自定义实现通过类，以强制实施授权策略;或由应用程序代码才能做出授权决定，或自定义用户体验根据集合中存在的声明。The property can be examined by custom implementations of the class to make authentication decisions or to filter, transform, or enrich an incoming claim set; by custom implementations of the class to enforce authorization policy; or by application code to make authorization decisions or to customize user experience based on the claims present in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，该框架设置优先级的类型标识返回标识时。By default, the framework prioritizes identities of type when returning the identity. 第一个中找到返回集合。The first found in the collection is returned. 如果没有任何在集合中，可从第一个标识返回。If there is no in the collection, the first identity assignable from is returned. 如果没有任何，`null`返回。If there is no , `null` is returned. 如果集合为空，引发。If the collection is empty, an is thrown. 您可以通过设置更改默认行为属性来指定要调用以确定标识的委托。You can change the default behavior by setting the property to specify a delegate to be called to determine the identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查此声明主体所拥有的标识是否包含一个声明的类型声明的值等于指定的值`role`参数。The method checks whether an identity that this claims principal possesses contains a claim of type where the value of the claim is equal to the value specified by the `role` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 每个具有其自己定义表示角色的声明类型。Each has its own definition of the claim type that represents a role. 此声明类型可以访问和通过设置属性。This claim type can be accessed and set through the property.
